isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - OWL (OIL WATER LAMP) / EWPS (ENGINE WARNING AND PROTECTION SYSTEM) - 2-WAY WARNING (RPM,ECT,EOP)

svcprocinfo.para: Engine over speed, engine overheat and engine oil pressure low are provided as the engine warning operating mode. No engine shutdown is available.

svcsubproc.title: ECT Warning Temperature
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when an engine overheat condition warrants the OIL/WATER lamp to be illuminated and the warning buzzer to be activated.

svcsubproc.title: ECT Critical Temperature
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when an engine overheat condition warrants an engine shutdown. The event logging feature will log when this event has occurred in both engine hours and odometer readings.

svcsubproc.title: EOP RPM Boundary 1
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates the RPM range for which engine oil pressure level 1 is to be used for the loss of engine oil pressure detection.

svcsubproc.title: EOP RPM Boundary 2
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates the RPM range for which engine oil pressure level 2 is to be used for the loss of engine oil pressure detection.

svcsubproc.title: EOP RPM Boundary 3
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates the RPM range for which engine oil pressure level 3 is to be used for the loss of engine oil pressure detection.

svcsubproc.title: EOP Warning Level 1
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when a loss of engine oil pressure condition warrants the OIL/WATER lamp to be illuminated and the warning buzzer to be activated.

svcsubproc.title: EOP Warning Level 2
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when a loss of engine oil pressure condition warrants the OIL/WATER lamp to be illuminated and the warning buzzer to be activated.

svcsubproc.title: EOP Warning Level 3
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when a loss of engine oil pressure condition warrants the OIL/WATER lamp to be illuminated and the warning buzzer to be activated.

svcsubproc.title: EOP Critical Level 1
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when a loss of engine oil pressure condition warrants an engine shutdown. The event logging feature will log when this event has occurred in both engine hours and odometer readings.

svcsubproc.title: EOP Critical Level 2
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when a loss of engine oil pressure condition warrants an engine shutdown. The event logging feature will log when this event has occurred in both engine hours and odometer readings.

svcsubproc.title: EOP Critical Level 3
svcsubproc.para: This parameter indicates when a loss of engine oil pressure condition warrants an engine shutdown. The event logging feature will log when this event has occurred in both engine hours and odometer readings.
